@fontburger @mattroxburgh Exactly‚ÄîPhotoshopping is an intentional act.  This is very different, and I‚Äôm still working through implications.
@mattroxburgh No, I‚Äôm not ignoring benefits: my concern is not with the existence of the feature, but its automated implementation.
@mattroxburgh @fontburger You‚Äôre ignoring the potential harm, and proposing humans act to accommodate code rather than the other way around.
@mattroxburgh @fontburger The failure modes here are enormous, and potentially quite damaging. Automating seems like a poor risk to me.
@fontburger People do all kinds of things for all kinds of reasons, using whatever they have to hand.
